main event: A bright orange light was observed to be stationary for a while, then moved away at a high rate of speed. The light was bright orange and appeared to be much higher than the trail that was left behind.
interesting points: The trail was bright orange in color.
When the object moved away, it turned to a very pale color and finally disappeared.
The object appeared to descend to the ground and then go back up in the air before disappearing.
The witness described the object as appearing like an airplane without wings.
The witness was unable to estimate the speed or distance of the object.
